text: I really don't even want to give it one star, but it looks like I have no choice. First of all, there service was okay when we walked in. The kid was nice to me, but just decided to stare down my shirt as I leaned over the counter, so freaking rude. So after that we waited about 10 minutes to get our food, and even though it's fast food I really don't mind waiting for good food, but when we asked for ranch for my wings they said it was 42 cents... I said nevermind. And when I got my wings I opened the box and they where small, and no sauce on them. I started to eat them and they where really soggy. Like they had been sitting out at least for 3-6 hours and then they put them in a microwave. GROSS!! And then I looked on the receipt and it said you only get one ounce of sauce! Cheap!! So my boyfriend decided to get 2 for $6 burger and a chicken sandwich. And he just says they where nasty. He did tell me that the little cheese bites that where in the burger and chicken sandwich... he says they tasted like fake cheese and they where a bit rubbery! Cooking 101... a microwave it's used for cooking!! This place needs to be shut down! There fries where okay, but I would have rather gone somewhere else. Now I have a stomachache and I am not happy at all. Wouldn't recommend it to anyone and I am never going back.

Took a while to get our food. There was like no one there and I soon understood why. Once we finally got our food I was very disappointed. Tasted like the cafeteria food I got in middle school. The chicken was soggy. The fries were under cooked. Just all around not very good. Not worth the price at all. I would go McDonald's over this place.

This location I'll give them 2 stars only because we like their food. 

First off customer service sucks here. Been here a handful of times and the workers here just suck. Once I came here and there was a really friendly female worker, who was very welcoming...Other than that some of the workers here need to either find new jobs or step up their game!! That is all.

Checker's problem is that it competes in the USA against titans like
Wendy's, Mc Donald's, and Burger King. Compared to those three
chains it rates a one star because it does NOT stand out in any
facet of the fast food competitive environment. Checker's lacks
top locations, the inside seating is small, the food is merely OK,
yet prices are higher than at those three chains. If Checker's was
in Haiti, or today's Venezuela, it would rate 4 or 5 stars in those
countries. But, IMO, in the USA Checker's is below average. If
you are starving and you pass a Checker's you won't die if you
buy a burger there...but if your stomach's growling can be held
in check 5 minutes longer then find Mc D, Wendy's or B.K.

This restaurant seems to market more towards those that want food late...so late we went. We went three times around 10 pm to try their famous shakes and every time we went, "the shake machine was down." Each time we felt forced to order something considering we were in the drive thru. Twice our simple orders were botched. Terrible multiple first impressions. Food wasn't even worth the extended wait.

Can there be a no star option??? I officially hate this location. 1. They couldn't just give the grand total at the intercom. 2. Forgot one of my damn orders, luckily I sat there and looked at my receipt and checked everything. (Wait for it, I didn't get my drink) 3. They took so long to come back to the window, not even hesitating to check. 4. No mf napkins. 5. The fries were soggy as fuck. AND 6.!!!! They forgot to give us our fucking large drink like I said. And I didn't realize it til I was almost home (was so irritated with the bad service already) and didn't think it was worth it to go back just thought I would never come again. Horrible service every time we come here. Hire new people seriously. my burger was disgusting, that was actually free because they took so damn long to come back to the window. Greatly appreciated. But if the service is this bad, bump down the price so that its "you get what you pay for" type of food. or quit

I had high hopes for this place. When I learned that they were building one (at this location), I was incredibly stoked because (previously) they only had 1 on Boulder/Lamb and that was way to far for me to drive.

This would be the first time I have been able to eat frequently at a Checkers since I moved to Las Vegas from Georgia 10 years ago.

Unfortunately, there are just too many flaws with this place for me to overlook, and here they are:

(1) The cooks can't tell the difference between sandwiches: I ordered a Big Chicken Deluxe... the only difference between the 'Deluxe' and the regular Big Chicken sandwich is that the deluxe comes with a tomato and cheese. ON 2 OCCASIONS IN A ROW they forgot to add the tomato and cheese. I had to bring it back to the counter and explain it to them. The SAME staff prepared it both times... so apparently they don't learn their lesson nor do they care.

(2) Pricing and menu layout is inaccurate and incredibly confusing. They have a HUGE sign on the OUTSIDE window stating that the "Big Chicken Deluxe" is 2-for-$6 yet on the menu (at the top) inside the building, it says it's 2-for-$5 ... I pointed this out to the cashier and she did nothing to get this corrected. So, I ended up paying MORE than what the menu says.

(3) For some strange reason, they make EVERYTHING available except napkins. Keep in mind this is really greasy food, so you're going to need some napkins. But, if you want napkins you have to go out of your way to ask them for some because they don't have the foresight

I took my kids out for dinner here last week. I never will return. It may be fast food, and I would never expect much, but they messed up all 3 orders, overcharged us, and we had to go through the drive through multiple times to get everything fixed. Double check your receipts!

Just left here spent 16.80 and by the time we drove home by the Southpoint, only the  Buford burgers _were worth eating.  
Our order was 2 Buford  burgers, 1 xlfry, and  a chicken bites combo with a coke. 
The chicken wad so hard you can play hockey with them. And this is the first time in  26 years that I've not eaten the fries  had to  toss them out. 'So sad

This is just a copy and paste from a McDonalds, the service is an average burger joint but the food is just bad and looks nothing like the advertisement it was soggy and flavorless. Best burger in town is in n out and I'm sticking to that!
Woooo!!!! Love this place!!! Missed ir soooo much. Havent had it in years. Since i moved to Vegas. Best fastfood FRIES!!!!!! Hands down
Sacoya has terrible service. She's rude and told me to reverse and drive back through the drive thru to help her drive thru time

I don't know why I come here. The food is not good. I have tried a couple of things here and there and besides the Fries. I can't eat anything else but the employees are so nice. Which is the reason I'm giving it 2 stars instead of 1. They are friendly. Much friendlier than a lot of fast food places.

I lived in LA and never went to rallies because I always went to Tommy burger because why would you go to rallies when there's a Tommy burger right down the street from your house but I just moved around this area and my kid had to pee so we wanted to Checkers and I felt bad I thought I needed to order something I have been addicted to Checkers ever since I literally have gone here three times this week I go to get chili hot dogs with no onions and I love to everything does not have cheese on it because I'm deathly allergic and the chili is amazing the quality of food is pretty standard like divey chili Burgers and Fries and hotdogs and chicken sandwiches I mean what's not to love always had great service I'm astounded at the low reviews
Prices are good but the fries are so addictive. My only complaint is they put way too much sauce/ condiments on the burgers

I absolutely love this place . Being from the south it is so great to have it here on the west coast . Always hot and fresh food made your way with a friendly smile . 
I definitely will be back . The fries are amazing and the sweet tea is so refreshing .
Only thing good is the Fries. Everything else is disgusting. They need to change management here, the quality control is a big let down.

Darn you undercover boss! I totally saw this place on tv and thought I would try it out because it looked so delicious. Bad idea,

Ordered food, went home. Damn it they forgot my wings. I live 20 minutes away so I decided not to go back.

Decided to eat my chili dog and chili fries. They were okay, nothing to write home about. Worst part was the horrid heart burn I got after. I never get heart burn. Sad. 

Next tried the grilled cheese bites. Eeek. So fake. Yuck. 

Sweet tea was way to sweet. I ended up just throwing it away.

When people say fast food, I now think of this instantly.

Not one thing was good. I was such a sad panda.

When I read some of these reviews I'm kind of laughing because what do you expect from a place like this? In the east coast, Checkers is only the the ghetto and they're terrible in quality and taste. You get what you pay for I guess. Spend a little more money and go to shake shack or habit burger. Avoid this place.

The fries alone are the reason I'm giving this place 4 stars.

The burgers are decent and as expected and the prices are fair and reasonable

....but I shit you not, the fries are phenomenal!!!

I've liked Checkers/Rally's, so I'm glad to see them back in the valley. Their menu varies enough to set them apart from Sonic Drive-in across the street. However, this location is still very new, and they haven't worked out all the kinks yet. Expect a wait. I've been here three times, and have had a longer than favorable wait time twice.

Late night snack and thirst quenching was needed desperately last night. Checker's Drive thru is open 24 hours.  They were having burger and sandwich specials for every budget, 2 for $3 and 2 for $5 mix and match.  I went with the 2 for $5 with the Bacon double burger and the Chicken Sandwich on sourdough.  This place seems to be a blend of Jack in the Box and Arby's.  

My Chicken sandwich was over microwaved because the edges were so hard.  The Bacon burger tasted very salty maybe from the type of bacon used.  Bacon also very dry and crumbly.  

This business should focus on product quality late night instead of speed.  If they took a few extra moments to improve the final product and ensuring things were fresh they could be busier.  Instead they had no line in the drive thru and put out mediocre late night snackage.

Compact Location, Be careful when exiting or entering the store, as you must cross over the drive thru area to enter or leave the store. The manager was distracted when taking my order this morning. The manager didn't seem to know the combo and separate items, their sizes, and the prices on the customer menu board, making the experience even more confusing. Then before taking my money, he said he would be right back and ran outside the store to deliver a late drive thru order. The manager also forgot to give me the cup for water, that I asked for. Even though this is a 24 hour location, the shake machine was not ready to make shakes this morning. There was a 15 minute wait on shakes, they told me, then when it was ready they made me go to the counter to pick it up. I had to return to the counter to pick up my food also, as they will not deliver it to the table. Some of the portion sizes with combos and with the special deals are good, but the service from the manager was lousy today for two walk in customers.

The double checker burger with cheese is super sloppy, with over powering sauce; the burger fell apart as I was taking a bite until the condiments fell on my shirt. The fries were crispy and good, but you can tell they share the oil with funnel cakes because there is a sweet taste to the fries. I would be afraid for those who are allergic to fish for they share the same oil with the chicken, fries, mozzarella sticks, and funnel cakes.

Very Disappointed! 
I just moved to Las Vegas and thought I would try out Checkers for the first time.  $7.01 for a "big" chicken sandwich which was tiny in proportion and flat. I could count how many frys were in the medium container at first glance.  Very small portions and they charged me another 42 cents for sauce!  Omg, Really?   I'll never eat there again. I'm still hungry!

Just not good. Those are the only 3 words you need to know. I've been here twice and I even attempt to go back. The first time I went was a couple months ago. I saw they had an add for sliders and spicy chicken. I was down. It sounded good. I had also heard good things about checker's, those people were wrong. I decided to get the sliders and a side of fries my first go around. I assumed it was just the sliders in the box s i ordered fries. So many fries and they were pretty soggy. Not a fan of soggy fries. eh. I have to add I went sometime near midnight. I asked for no lettuce. Of course when I got home they had lettuce on them. The first one went down pretty easy, the second one I just couldn't do it. It was just not good. I wanted to review then but forgot. Tonight I went to grab fries and a sammich from McDonalds but they were only taking cash. I decided to headed farther down the road and get some fries and try it again. This time I decided to ask for well done fries and just a value cheeseburger ketchup only. I get up to the window and hear something about ketchup, cool they heard me. NOPE. I get home after eating most of the fries in the car, which were good, and bite into my burger a there is ketchup.. mustard.. pickles.. To top it off it tasted like shit. It wasn't warm, the cheese wasn't melted at all. I felt bad letting my dog eat the rest but she enjoyed it. This place is not worth your money or time.

Usually love coming here, good food and cheap, but today completely changed that. I ordered wings because every time I've gotten them they've been great, and today after waiting almost 10 minutes at the window I finally get my wings and come home to find out that they've been so over cooked to the point where there was no meat left on them. Honestly, how could they give that to someone? The wings are thinner than my finger. Literally all bone.

I visited this location yesterday and was very disappointed with everything that happened. I visit checkers very often as it is close to my home and usually quite satisfying. However last night was probably my last time. I always order the half pound chicken box meal with BBQ sauce. My first frustration was being stuck in line for 30 minutes with employees that didn't seem to know what they were doing. 

The only friendly person i saw was the girl that gave me my soda at the window. When I got home BBQ sauce was poured all over my chicken inside the box which blew me away. I was instantly disgusted because being fast food this is not okay and highly unexpected seeing I order here frequently. The BBQ sauce was even different and not the normal sauce they hand out. Already being frustrated I called the restaurant and the person answered HELLO.... after seconds of pausing thinking i called the wrong number the person says and I quote, "What would you like to order?" It gets worse. I asked for the manager and the gentleman states to me that the manager doesn't speak very good English. Again blown away, how can you manage a facility and speak little to no English being a primarily English establishment. 

I went into detail as to what was wrong with my order and the employee stated to me that the staff must of been lazy as to why sauce was in my chicken box. With confusion I told him I always order the same thing and this has never happened, why has it happened now. He said he didn't know. 

Checkers needs to get there employees in order, because this whole visit was unprofessional, and I will not be returning.

Zero stars. We waited 30 minutes for our food and ended up getting our money back because they are totally disorganized and slow. They were messing up all the drive thru orders also. They also took away the free drink refills. I do not recommend this place at all.

Yikes! I'm so glad that I've yet to have a bad experience here! Every time I've came here I've got fast service in the drive thru as well as been pleased with exactly what I've ordered! The reason I am giving them 4 stars is because they NEVER have my apple pies ready!! Ugh! But other than that I have no complaints! Late nights on the weekend can be pretty busy but for the most part they do a great job moving that line!

was excited for this new burger place to open down the street....what a disappointment! We went on a Monday about 5:30pm....place was not busy....it took a long time to get our order so we were hoping for something fresh and delicious..WRONG!  The burgers were mushy and tasteless...the chili that was on the fries was inedible!  If you are in the area and looking for a burger....Sonic is across the street

If this is part of the old fast food chain rally's then I am even more happy to try it out. I had this the other day for the first time and I was very happy with the food. Fries were seasoned and had a little spice to it and the burger was juicy. Also the place was packed but we still got our food quickly. I will be going here often.

Updating my review since I've tried more items on their menu. The Big Buford is still my favorite, but it's inconsistent but always enjoyable regardless. Tonight I ordered 1 checker burger which was decent and a chili cheese dog that I enjoyed add well be ordering again. I also decided to try their chicken sandwich and it was good! The total came out to $6.02 with an apple pie thrown in, I thought that the price was really really really good for the amount of enjoyable food and great customer service I received.

1* for the seasoned fries which were excellent. 

Now for the negatives. HOW can a single cheeseburger cost $1 MORE than a double? 

Cheese wasn't melted because the burgers were barely warm. The order was completely incorrect as well. 

I'll be back for the fries and the fries alone. We got four burgers and fries for $18. Two of those burgers were two for $5. 

This begs the question, "WHY WOULD YOU GO HERE OVER IN N OUT?!"

Oh Man, I was dying to try this place but will most likely never eat here again. 

Ordered two Philly's, two Montreal bacon burgers, a hot dog kids meal, and chili fries.

Restaurant was freezing inside. No utensils or napkins provided. Had to stand at counter and wait for someone to ask. Food came out cold. Had to send my kid's hot dog back as we ordered it plain and it was smothered in ketchup and cheese sauce.

When we got her hot dog replacement, it was served in burned bun. Gross! As for the burgers...just ok. Philly's: just ok. Chili fries were disgusting. The chili tasted like ketchup with brown sugar in it. Yuck!

Save yourself the trouble and go to one of the other 20 way better restaurants on same block!

I'll start out where it all went really, really wrong. No soap in the ladies restrooms. Had to go to the men's loo to wash my hands (eek) and almost yacked right there. Pee in the toilet, skid marks, dirty walls. Gross, gross, gross!!!!! Also knowing that there are male and female employees that a) leave the restrooms in that state - because that was the look of progressive dirtiness- and b) don't have soap to wash their hands. YAK! Prior to the restroom experience, I thought the burgers were too saucey (seems to be the theme of the week between Yama & here), flavorless, rubbery. Not my fave. One positive thing was the vanilla milkshake...

But then on the way out of the restroom, senses now heightened to the detail of the dining room, that's when I noticed the detail of the dining room. The floors didn't look clean, food on floors, hand smudges all over shiny surfaces. Business 101 - Now, had the restrooms been in good shape, I likely wouldn't have been sensitive to the dining room not really noticed the lack of wiped surfaces. 

I was curious to find out what a Checkers burger was all about, it was memorable and forgettable in all the wrong places.

I was pressed for time during my lunch hour because I had to get to the bank and run some other errands. I was originally going to go to McDonald's because the service is fast, food tastes good and the prices are clearly displayed.  However my buddy suggested Checker's instead. My lunch at Checkers turned out to be a disaster.   We went into the restaurant and there were no customers waiting. I thought to myself, this should be nice and easy.  Both my friend and I ordered the Spicy chicken combo.  While we were waiting for the food, my friend noticed a sign that said 4 items for $3.  We asked the guy at the register about why we were charged higher and he said that we ordered the chicken combo off the menu board. I asked well what the heck did we order that was different from the special and he said that it was the same chicken but because we didn't specifically state that we wanted the special, we couldn't get it.  I then told him that I want to cancel my order and get a refund so I can order the special.  For 18 minutes, no joke, we were going back and forth with this guy trying to get a refund. He eventually and reluctantly gave us a refund.  Meanwhile, our food was sitting on the counter behind the register the entire time we were arguing. The food of course was colder than Antarctica by the time we got it.  I filled out the survey online when I got home that night and asked to be contacted by someone in management. Today, it 's 02/17/17 and I still have not received a call from anyone.  What should have happened is that when we ordered the chicken combo, the employee should have mentioned the special to see if we were interested in it.  And then when I asked for a response from Checkers management, somebody should have reached out to me. I will not be returning here even if you gave me free food for the rest of the  year.

Ok I was really scared about going here due to the reviews but I'm such a fan from the ones on the east coast that I decided to try anyway. Got the #10 added cheese to the dog and made the fries fully loaded. Only came to $6.99. Not bad. Offered no cutlery or condiments so be sure to ask for it. Staff was nice but just going through the motions. There was no one in the drive through and only 2 patrons inside so they were probably bored out of their mind. 

Four stars due to lack of attention to detail. Go the extra step in service. Food was delish!

Went to checkers on a friends recommendation that they used to eat it all the time in California. I will start off by saying that the food is ok hence the one star, if I could give this place a 0 stars i still would give just the one star for the food. 

The reason for the 4 star reduction is because of napkins and 3 stars because of the really crappy engineered drive through. Its the thinnest drive thru we have ever driven through. we made a wide right hand turn from the pick up window and still scraped our rim. Ok so I thought maybe we are just somewhat retarded and decided to eat our food in the car and watch other cars and how they navigate what I felt was crappy design. It took us 15 minutes to eat our food and in that time frame we counted 22 cars, 14 of them being Suvs out of the 14 suvs 9 of them hit the curb or ran over it. The other 8 vehicles 3 hit the curb. 

I would never ever recommend this place to anyone especially anyone who cares about their cars. If someone from Checkers reads this, I really think you guys need to redesign that drive thru.

I come here specifically for the fries and they are thee best for a fast food joint. I also live near buy and I get the occasional coupon for 2 for 1 big Buford's which is a killer deal! Would have gaven this location 5 stars only if there dive thru access was less narrow when exiting. You can damage your tires/rims if your not paying attention so be careful. Otherwise, great spot!

We stopped in here for quick dinner on at Saturday night around 8:00pm. We thought the place was closed, no ine in drive through or the parking lot. However,  we seen lights on so we went through drive through. The lady taking our order was short, voice not very friendly when we asked questions (this being our very first time here). We got up to the window, it took about 5 minutes before anyone came to the window, asked for our payment, gave our card back. Then took another 25 minutes for our food to come out *(mind you we were the only customers in sight)* when we got it, she forgot to give us our drinks, then told us the what we ordered to drink just ran out. Finally we got our whole order and was on our way. We had a positive attitude thinking maybe the reason it was taking so long was because they were making fresh food for us! We were wrong, OUR FOOD WAS COLD!! Needless to say, this was our first and only trip to Checkers. would not recommend anyone go here. One would think there would be at least one saving grace: friendly staff, great food, excellent sevice. We received  none of those things!

Selection is actually pretty good comparable to the usual fast food joints.  I went here because I found coupons in the mail to finally make me go try this place out.  I was satisfied with the variety of they had.
If I was not stuck in the drive thru I would leave. I have been sitting here for 15 min two cars in front of me.... I have given this place too many chances. Please needs some help.
I love the burgers here but they always mess up my order. They don't listen to any special orders. I'm no longer going here and only BK so I can have it my way.
I really don't see why there are some negative reviews. I am usually a fan of sonic, I won't be going back there. I am in love with this place!

Oh Checkers, how you disappoint! SMH. We were excited to see a new restaurant joint in the area but it was a total fail! On our first visit, they suggested we try the big buford and wings, too bad we ordered a 10 piece buffalo wing and they only gave us 5. We figured they just opened and maybe they haven't gotten a flow yet. So weeks later.... on our 2nd visit, we gave them another chance but yet again another fail! We ordered two big buford meals and they forgot one of the burgers! SMH I've got to say, we won't be back!!

Do not waist you time with this. Stopped in for a quick lunch. Absolutely dead but still took forever to get a simple burger. customer service was horrible staff  is rude and they do not even know there own menu or whats on what. Burger sucked it was hard as a Hockey Puck and not very hot. Bathrooms very nasty scary to even use. Think twice before going to this place.
Hamburger was worse than McDonald's hamburger. Sloppy and soggy and messy. The fries were average. Nothing impressed me and I will not be giving it a second chance.

Chicken Sandwich is good nothing super good,seasoned fries ok. But the inside was empty and the place was very dirty, you could smell the bathroom. Cashiers were nice fast services, but inside and area by condiments were gross.

Wow I wish I could leave 0 stars and bring down their overall rating.  Went to drive through for a late dinner.  When asked if I want a number 1 I politely declined and explained I would need a min as I had never been here before.  The lady then scoffed and waited.  When I asked for a number 4 and a number 1 I explained I would need the number 4 as sandwich only not the combo.  The lady then screamed over the headset "OH MY GOD! UGHH!"  I completely lost it.  I decided to yell back such it's such a big deal just forget it and f*** off.  I will be calling the GM first thing tomorrow and filing a complaint. 11pm

i'm only doing three stars because the food is actually really good. On another note, the location and the staff look like they all hate their lives. There was a cricket jumping around in the lobby area. The "main" lady in assuming was talking back to the customers. The wait for the food is outrageously long. All the workers were complaining and just looked very lost.
This place is horrible and overpriced! Do your self and stomach a favor and don't go here lol

I don't want to even give 1 star. I ordered 4 items last night and it took more than 30 min from the min I walked in to the time I received my food. Service is horrible and the manager on duty was even worse! It took 10 min to order as we were second on line. The group in front were obnoxious n loud and was cursing like drunken pirates. When I got to order, I asked the manager if that's how he wants customers to act in here, full grown adults acting like its their first time out?!!!  He said "no, but oh well!" It was so bad that after I finally ordered I made my daughter wait in the car due to the inappropriate behavior inside. Furthermore, waiting an additional 23 min for food was ridiculous. The floor was dirty and the kitchen was a disaster.  Food on the floor. Not one apology when I kept asking for my food. They have cameras ...I hope they take a look at this. I already complained to home office with specific time and place...hope they do something to fix this garbage up!

This was my first visit to the Checker's chain and I came away pretty happy. This chain is known for its drive-thru concept but this particular location had a comfortable dining room that was clean.

On my visit it was dinner time and there were about 8 people seated. The decor of the restaurant is kind of a 50's retro. The menu has a large selection of burgers and chicken and from reading the advertisements they are very proud of their fries.

Ordered the "Big Buford". It is a double burger that comes with American Cheese, pickles, red onions, lettuce, tomatoes, mayonnaise and ketchup. The produce was really crisp and fresh. The cheese was not melted on the burger which suggests it was put together to order and hadn't been assembled prior to my order. The warmth of the beef eventually melted my cheese. The bun was fantastic for a fast food bun. The bun had a kaiser like consistency and was a step above the normal sesame seed standard. The burger had a nice seasoning.

The fries were different from most chains I have visited. They had a batter that gave them a nice crunch and the seasoning had a peppery note. Good flavor and I appreciated the effort. 

The meal was super cheap and filling and I was satisfied. Please take my four star with a grain of salt. I am measuring this place with other fast food chains in its market (Carl's Jr., Jack in the Box, McDonald's etc. ) and I think it is a step above. Give 'em a shot.
The burger and fries were served cold. The staff was unorganized. I am disappointed. They also held the refills hostage by not having the lobby machine working.
This is only based on 2 things. The Fries & Wings. So far so good. & I might add that these are the best fries I've had from a fast food chain.

I regrettably ordered a #10- chili dog 
I'm not going to get into detail. 
Two words: food poisoning

Don't go here.  I know you might want to try it but these good reviews are people who sadly have no taste buds. I got fries a burger and the spicy chicken. The spicy chicken which I am almost positive they drive down the street got it from McDonald's re wrapped it and gave it to me for 50 cents more.. Only McDonald's chicken is better quality.. That's right McDonald's is better which is the only time I have or will ever say that.  Their burger was flavorless and had the same consistency as burgers you find in the frozen dinner isle at Walmart. They have a lot of bells and whistles. Like wings, seasoned fries and whatever but trust me it's not worth it. Don't waste your time go across the street you'll be happy you did.

This place is pretty awesome. A lot like the old Rally's I remember as a kid. Fries aren't quite as insanely good as I remember but the burgers are pretty good. But, be careful leaving the drive-thru! It's super narrow and has a sharp bend and there are tire rub marks all over that damn thing... and I clipped my rim... damn it...

I warn everyone not to go to this place, especially this location!!!!!! HORRIBLE! So here I am making another review for this place and both experience are horrible. First of all the workers always seem like they hate their job. Bad customer service and second of all, the food are ALWAYS ALWAYS half ass! They can't even fill the fries up to the top! What is that?! The food is always a disappointment. I'm reminding myself to never come here again! And when we asked the girl at the drive thru for ranch, she gave it to my bf with it all leaking so he ended up having ranch all over his hand! This place is TRASH!

Total disappointment.   Considering sonic is right across the street I don't see any reason why anyone would choose checkers over that. I tried the chili dog, spicy chicken sandwich and a medium seasoned fries. The chili on the chili dog seems to be mostly bbq sauce and was pretty gross.  The spicy chicken sandwich was ok... pretty standard fast food.  

The seasoned fries were actually quite good but they are super stingy with them.  I got a medium and it was smaller than the average small fries anywhere else. 

I don't think I'll be coming back

I have been stuck in the drive through line for 20 mins and cannot leave because of the cars in front of me. I will NEVER come back here due to this one visit. Management needs to come up with some type of training to make this more efficient.

Came here after seeing this new burger place opened up in the southwest side of town, across the street from Sonic on Durango. We had burgers, chicken strips, chicken wings with fries. The burger was just so so, the buns were cold, that's all I can remember about the burger. Chicken strips and wings were also just so so...nothing to rave about. You can get a much better burger from In & Out or even Sonic. All the napkins, sauces and ketchup you have to ask for since they are all behind the cashier, don't know why. Also, don't know why they opened in this location since there are many other burger and wing places around there. Well, I can say I have tried a Checkers burger now. :-(

I was so excited when I saw the sign coming soon!! I'm an east coast girl and just like Five Guys, Checkers is pretty popular for us. This location has yet to disappoint! My food is ALWAYS hot and fresh not to mention GOOD! My favorites are the Asian wings and the Champ burger. Oh and can we talk about those perfectly seasoned crispy fries #jackpot! Some days I go just for the fries #soserious.

Just got home with my two Chili cheese dogs, buns had green mold on them!!!!
I can't believe they would serve moldy food...!
I ordered at their drive thru, they asked me to wait at the parking lots. I spend 25 mins waiting on my food. There were 5 different cars after me all done n left. What the heck!!

So I've checked out this place a few times and I am hooked on their fries and grilled cheese sticks! Fries have great flavor, texture, and cooked to perfection. The grilled cheese sticks, if you're a cheese lover its so gooey and cheesy that you have to try! Now for dessert, if you have a chocolate craving/sweet tooth (especially if you're a woman and your "Friend" is in town lol) you have to try their oreo sundae! #OreoLover haha Anyways I've tried most of their menu items and I think there burgers and chicken sandwiches are average - considering it is a fast food joint and not a gourmet restaurant. The best part is they're cheaper price wise compared to everything else that's out there. My only complaint is that if you're in drive thru and have to wait for them to finish cooking your food, they want you to park in front of the red no parking zone as they dont have a designated place to park and wait for them to finish and bring out your food.

1 star is being generous. I love burgers and was excited to try a new place. Such a disappointment, there was more condiments on the burger than actual meat. It was terrible. I would much rather go to In-n-Out or Five Guys, plus those places are cheaper than Checkers and I had coupons! Won't be back.
I don't write bad reviews often. The food here is just poor quality and not tasty at all. The prices are good but I'd rather pay more for better food.

I like the food at Checkers, however, they get my order wrong more than half of the time.  Also tired of them changing their "special" every other day.  It's ANNOYING!!!  One day it's a 4 for 4 deal, tomorrow they change it to 4 for 3 and then it's back to 4 for 4; make up your damn mind.  I've also have had them not honor a deal that was on display.

First time into a checkers ever this week. Always drove by and decided to stop in. Friendly counter guy. Menu had options and prices weren't too bad. I ordered a mix of items to sample. Fries are so so they're seasoned but nothing special. Burger was typical frozen patty flat and so so. Chicken bites were not as good as sonic. They had Mr Pibb which was a plus I'm a fan of it. Biggest complaints the floor was like walking in a glue fly trap it was so sticky. In the men's room the paper towel and soap is so close to the sink you can't get in there to access the sink. Probably wouldn't repeat. Nothing special.

I experienced bad customer service, kids that work there that don't pay attention to what they are doing and forget items in the order. The cheeseburger fries and Oreo milkshake all tasted like crap. Even the fruit punch tasted watered down.
Won't be back
Terrible customer service I ordered  medium fresh fries they half ass filled up the fries and they were not fresh I will not be back and will tell others.
Their fries is the only thing I would go back for. Ordered the wing combo. $8 expensive for 5 very small wings n fries.

Went very late (around 2:30am) and was immediately greeted by friendly staff.
Ishmael was a great guy and very fast.

Loved the food!

I tried it and wasn't impressed. My burger was small and not good, wasn't cooked all the way plus didn't seem fresh. The mozzarella sticks were tiny and not worth it either had like a freezer burn taste to them. Just nasty, I'll pass of this joint for life.
